# Arrange

## 1. Brief Description
The `arrange()` function organizes a data frame by rearranging the rows according to the variable(s) that are provided to the function. This is done in an ascending or descending order.

## 2. What Package Contains It
The `arrange()` function is part of the `dplyr` package.

## 3. When To Use It
The `arrange()` function can be used to quickly arrange rows in a data frame by a certain variable or group of variables. This
